name: FNAB UCS
description:
Fnab UCS is here. 

Space = Flashlight

A-D = Side doors

Q = Camera up

E = Mask

R-F = Vent doors

W = Fan

1 = Ac

2 = Change music

3 = Heater

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

New characters, and AI changes

Golden Ben- same as Withered Golden Ben

Withered Ben and Hank- same as Withered Tom

Nightmare Hank- He runs at you close the door on the side he is at

Jack O Tom- same as jack o angela

FunTime Ben- N/A

Boomerang- Crawls in the vents use the vent snare to stop them

Shadow Ben- same as Nightmare CEO

Freddy FrostBear- Reverse Jack O Angela

Corrupted SpringTrap- Vent Crawler

Mr Incredible (icon is lefty)- Works like foxy from Fnaf 1

Hide The Pain Harold - don't keep your camera up for too long

Emily Elephant- same as the other Mediocre Melodies but disables duct doors after he hits them

Credits: Some designs were made by  JeSs and Animefan on discord
